1.verse: I will lift up mine eyes unto the hills, from whence cometh my help.

2.verse: My help cometh from the LORD, which made heaven and earth.

3.verse: He will not suffer thy foot to be moved: he that keepeth thee will not slumber.

4.verse: Behold, he that keepeth Israel shall neither slumber nor sleep.

5.verse: The LORD is thy keeper: the LORD is thy shade upon thy right hand.

6.verse: The sun shall not smite thee by day, nor the moon by night.

7.verse: The LORD shall preserve thee from all evil: he shall preserve thy soul.

8.verse: The LORD shall preserve thy going out and thy coming in from this time forth, and even for evermore.
